articles.author: Fiona Connor
articles.title: Nasa to SMASH giant asteroid with aircraft at 23,000kph in £240m mission to defend the earth... - The Sun
articles.content:
NASA is set to smash a giant asteroid with an aircraft at 23,000kph in a bid to defend the earth.
The £240m mission, dubbed DART after Double Asteroid Redirection Test, is expected to take place in … [+2415 chars]

articles.author: Lizzie May
articles.title: This is what a black hole sounds like: NASA releases audio recorded by its Chandra X-ray observatory - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA has released the audio of a black hole at the centre of Perseus galaxy cluster more than 200 million lightyears away from earth, recorded by the Chandra X-ray observatory.
articles.content:
NASA scientists have released the audio of a black hole at the centre of Perseus galaxy cluster more than 200 million lightyears away from earth.
